title: Investigating the Efficacy of Topologically Derived Time Series for Flare Forecasting. II. XGBoost Model
summary: Solar flares are a primary driver of space weather, and forecasting their occurrence remains a significant challenge. This paper presents a novel flare prediction model based on topologically derived photospheric magnetic parameters.
